content: this pattern was originally released as a knit-along from january to march 2009 vernal equinox shawl surprise kal group 1 was created at ravelry for the knit-along there is also a group called celebrate spring 2 for this shawl pictures of various vernal equinox shawls are gathered at vernal equinox shawl surprise gallery 3 basic lace knitting knowledge needed **23 12 2017 dutch version available this version is made as easy to read as possible and therefore suitable e g for dyslectic knitters thank you very much saskia 4 hartelijk bedankt saskia **14 3 2015 vernal equinox shawl stitch count sheet by annagret 5 available ves spreadsheets for lankakomero pdf 6 thank you so much annagret **4 7 2013 french version available merci beaucoup marie 7 ** **7 5 2013 estonian version available many thanks for translating kaisukas 8 ** **14 9 2012 danish version available thank you very much for translation bente 9 **25 5 2012 german version available many thanks for
